answer414	Describe the paths in this diagram and explain how those paths account for the results.	there is a path containing A and a different path containing B and C	SwitchesBulbsParallel-OPT2_EXPLAIN_Q.sbj48-l2.qa126	There are two separate paths in this diagram. If bulbs b or c are out, bulb a will not be affected because it will still be contained in a closed path with the battery.
